quote: In the darkest and strangest of places with the most macabre of company, this music moves her and her life pulses hard... And even for Julie's safety, I can't bring myself to smother it.
quote_letters: IN THE DARKEST AND STRANGEST OF PLACES WITH THE MOST MACABRE OF COMPANY THIS MUSIC MOVES HER AND HER LIFE PULSES HARD AND EVEN FOR JULIES SAFETY I CANT BRING MYSELF TO SMOTHER IT
